_comment: Fundamentals Override File - Corrects misleading or missing API data for better LLM analysis

_format_notes.description: This file overrides fundamental data fetched from APIs when the data is incorrect or misleading
_format_notes.usage: Data here takes precedence over API responses. Only include fields that need correction.
_format_notes.country_guidelines: Use descriptive 8-letter max abbreviations that help LLM understand geographic exposure

VEE.TO.description_note: Emerging markets ETF with exposure to China, India, Taiwan, Brazil, Middle East, Mexico - NOT Canadian stocks despite being listed on TSX

XMA.TO.description_note: TSX-listed materials sector ETF focused on Canadian mining, forestry, and commodity companies

GMIN.TO.description_note: Mining company with global operations - not just Canada despite TSX listing

SMH.description_note: Global semiconductor ETF with heavy exposure to Taiwan, South Korea, US chip companies

URNM.description_note: Global uranium mining ETF with exposure to Kazakhstan, Canada, Australia, Africa

URNJ.description_note: Global junior uranium miners ETF - smaller cap uranium exploration companies worldwide

EXAMPLE.TO.description_note: This is an example entry showing all possible override fields
